title: John Garvey (rugby league)
text:
John Garvey (18 Mar 1913 – Nov 1984) was an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1930s. He played at representative level for <a href="England%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">England</a> and <a href="Rugby%20League%20XIII">English League XIII</a>, and at club level for <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St. Helens</a>, <a href="Broughton%20Rangers">Broughton Rangers</a> and <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a>, as a , or , i.e. number 3 or 4, or 6.
Playing career.
International honours.
Jack Garvey won <a href="Cap%20%28sport%29">cap</a>s for <a href="England%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">England</a> while at St. Helens in 1933 against <a href="Other%20Nationalities%20rugby%20league%20team">Other Nationalities</a>, and while at Broughton Rangers in 1936 against Wales.
Championship Final appearances.
Jack Garvey played in <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St. Helens</a>' 9-5 victory over <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield</a> in the <a href="Rugby%20Football%20League%20Championship">Championship</a> Final during the <a href="1931%E2%80%9332%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Championship%20Play-Off">1931–32 season</a> at <a href="Belle%20Vue%20%28Wakefield%29">Belle Vue</a>, <a href="Wakefield">Wakefield</a> on Saturday 7 May 1932.
County Cup Final appearances.
Jack Garvey played in <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St. Helens</a>' 9-10 defeat by <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington</a> in the <a href="1932%E2%80%9333%20Lancashire%20Cup">1932–33</a> <a href="RFL%20Lancashire%20Cup">Lancashire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20cups">County Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1932%E2%80%9333%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1932–33 season</a> at <a href="Central%20Park%20%28Wigan%29">Central Park</a>, <a href="Wigan">Wigan</a> on Saturday 19 November 1932, and played in <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a> 10-7 victory over <a href="Salford%20Red%20Devils">Salford</a> in the <a href="1938%E2%80%9339%20Lancashire%20Cup">1938–39</a> <a href="RFL%20Lancashire%20Cup">Lancashire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20cups">County Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1938%E2%80%9339%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1938–39 season</a> at <a href="Station%20Road%2C%20Swinton">Station Road, Swinton</a> on Saturday 22 October 1938.
